questions.question: Which of the following drugs is an alkylating agent used in cancer chemotherapy?
Which of the following medications is an antimetabolite used for treating rheumatoid arthritis and certain types of cancer?
Which of the following drugs is a proteasome inhibitor used in the treatment of multiple myeloma?
Which of the following medications is a monoclonal antibody that targets vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF), used for treating certain types of cancer?
Which of the following drugs is an anticoagulant that acts by inhibiting the activation of vitamin K-dependent clotting factors?
Which of the following medications is an antiretroviral drug belonging to the integrase inhibitor class?
Which of the following drugs is a tyrosine kinase inhibitor used to treat chronic myeloid leukemia?
Which of the following medications is a monoclonal antibody targeting the CD20 antigen on B-cells, used for treating non-Hodgkin's lymphoma and rheumatoid arthritis?
Which of the following drugs is a topoisomerase I inhibitor used in the treatment of ovarian and colorectal cancer?
Which of the following medications is an antiviral drug used to treat chronic hepatitis C infection that acts as a NS5A inhibitor?
